CustomField.description: Global field - (Data Universal Numbering System ) is a number that is assigned to each of our locations. For use in credit decisions. Also referred to as D&B Nbr. Currently used by Store Data and IA. Field Type: GBL Integrated: N
CustomField.inlineHelpText:
Enter the 9-digit DUNS Number aka D&B Number.
Responsible Owner: Retail Accounting and Credit
CustomField.label: DUNS Nbr (D&B Nbr)
